channel.title: Rke on Kubermates
channel.description: Recent content in Rke on Kubermates

item.title: Release v1.8.7
item.description: RKE Kubernetes versions What’s Changed Rancher Kubernetes Engine (RKE) is reaching its end of life. Version 1.8 is the final release in the RKE 1. x series. We strongly recommend migrating to Rancher’s newer Kubernetes distribution, RKE2, to stay supported, secure, and take advantage of the latest features and updates. For more details, please refer to the official SUSE EOL article. NOTE: v1.32.8-rancher1-1 and v1.31.12-rancher1-1 are not available without an active RKE Extended Life subscription. For more details, please refer to the SUSE EOL article. v1.32.8-rancher1-1 v1.31.12-rancher1-1 v1.30.14-rancher1-1 v1.30.14-rancher1-1 v1.31.12-rancher1-1 v1.31.12-rancher1-1 v1.32.8-rancher1-1 (default) v1.32.8-rancher1-1 [release/v1.8] go generate by @krunalhinguu in #3885 Full Changelog : v1.8.6. v1.8.7.
